titleStmt.title: Dr. Donne's Last will and testament, July 21, 1657
titleStmt.author: Donne, John, 1604-1662.

notesStmt.note: "When I made this will, I was alone ; afterwards I desired my good friends the Earl of Marleburgh, and Mr. Glascocke to witness it, which was in Novem 6. the 2d 1661." [signed] John Donne.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
